entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as a house that only its members know the password to.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to figure out if someone from Gryffindor stole Riddle's diary.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who is accompanying him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who is urging him to report the robbery.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a teacher who is enthusiastic about Quidditch and mentions that it's perfect conditions.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is mentioned as the owner of the diary that was stolen.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who was expelled fifty years ago and Harry doesn't want to bring it up again.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
Ron is a friend of Harry's.
Hermione is a friend of Harry's.
